Presets.Name: SOUTH VIS
Presets.AirportConditions: SIMUL VIS APCHS 16L AND 16R IN USE. CHARTED VIS APCHS IN USE. DEPTG RWYS 16L AND 16C. SIMUL APCHS IN USE TO SEA APRT AND BFI. TFC BELOW YOU ON FINAL.
Presets.Notams: ARRS ADVS IF YOU HAVE 2 RWY SCENERY.

Presets.Name: SOUTH ILS
Presets.AirportConditions: SIMUL ILS RWY 16R AND 16L APCHS IN USE. DEPTG RWYS 16L AND 16C. SIMUL APCHS IN USE TO SEA APRT AND BFI. TFC BELOW YOU ON FINAL.
Presets.Notams: ARRS ADVS IF YOU HAVE 2 RWY SCENERY.

Presets.Name: SOUTH LOW VIS
Presets.AirportConditions: ILS RWY 16R AND 16L APCHS IN USE. DEPTG RWYS 16L AND 16C. SIMUL APCHS IN USE TO SEA APRT AND BFI. TFC BELOW YOU ON FINAL.
Presets.Notams: LOW VISIBILITY PROCS IN EFCT. DO NOT ENTER ILS CRITCAL AREAS. ASDEX IN USE. ACFT MUST OPER XPNDR ON MODE C ON ALL TWYS AND RWYS. ARRS ADVS IF YOU HAVE 2 RWY SCENERY.

Presets.Name: SOUTH SUGGESTED
Presets.Notams: ARRS ADVS IF YOU HAVE 2 RWY SCENERY.

Presets.Name: NORTH VIS
Presets.AirportConditions: SIMUL VIS APCHS 34R AND 34L IN USE. CHARTED VIS APCHS IN USE. DEPTG RWYS 34R AND 34C.
Presets.Notams: ARRS ADVS IF YOU HAVE 2 RWY SCENERY.

Presets.Name: NORTH ILS
Presets.AirportConditions: SIMUL ILS RWY 34L AND 34R APCHS IN USE. DEPTG RWYS 34R AND 34C.
Presets.Notams: ARRS ADVS IF YOU HAVE 2 RWY SCENERY.

Presets.Name: NORTH LOW VIS
Presets.AirportConditions: ILS RWY 34L AND 34R APCHS IN USE. DEPTG RWYS 34R AND 34C.
Presets.Notams: LOW VISIBILITY PROCS IN EFCT. DO NOT ENTER ILS CRITCAL AREAS. ASDEX IN USE. ACFT MUST OPER XPNDR ON MODE *C ON ALL TWYS AND RWYS. ARRS ADVS IF YOU HAVE 2 RWY SCENERY.

Presets.Name: NORTH SUGGESTED
Presets.Notams: ARRS ADVS IF YOU HAVE 2 RWY SCENERY.

AirportConditionDefinitions.Text: VFR ACFT SAY DRCTN OF FLT.

NotamDefinitions.Text: GATE HOLD PROCS ARE IN EFCT. CTC RAMP CONTROL PRIOR TO PUSH AND START.
